---
title: "Are Mindfulness-based Interventions Effective?"
---

*This article is a stub.*
*Do not hesitate to substantiate.*

Mindfulness-based interventions use meditation to improve the focus and decrease the stress of students.

The most recent (to our knowledge) meta-analysis of the effect of Mindfulness-based interventions on students can be found [here](https://doi.org/10.3389/fpsyg.2014.00603).

No tests for publication bias is reported.
The dataset is online and could be transported to SKY.
